title: The Fall of the Shadow
content:
Since it seems to be usual and normal for people here to post inactivity threads, it's my turn.

I have not worked on my Keen mod for half a year, and my fangame was frozen again last week. I'll probably resume work on it soon, but not on my Keen mods series. So, it's a pity, but I seem to have lost interest in Keening. That's right. Even having the time, I seem not to have the inspiration, so, I can do nothing but wait for it. Until then...

Yeah, I'm still around for no reason at all. No big deal. I just want to say...
THE N00BS MUST DIE!!!

OK. That's it. I'll be around daily as usual, just doing nothing productive for the community. Of course, projects such as EModKeen and I-Don't-Remember-Its-Name are still in my hard disk, waiting for inspiration.

EDIT: Oh, and I have big projects with other game, not Keen, actually. That's the secondary reason I left these in the freezing pool.------------------------------
[url=http://shadowm2006.sitesled.com/]My website[/url]
[url=http://p072.ezboard.com/fpubliccommanderkeenforumfrm20.showMessage?topicID=12.topic]Get Windows/Linux native LModKeen 2 with integrated FIN2BMP![/url]. You know you want to.
[url=http://shadowm2006.sitesled.com/meta/projectpage.htm]The META engine for 2D games[/url].

title: Re: The Fall of the Shadow
content:
Very inspiring... [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smoke2.gif[/img] Well, sorry to hear that Shadow, your mod art looked pretty good, and winning the most Keenish category (if I remember right, or then it was some other category) in Keen 1 level competition showed you had skills for level making as well. Maybe one day... [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wink.gif[/img]

What is the other project?3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: The Fall of the Shadow
content:
Secret. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mischief.gif[/img]

But not all is lost. Er, well, TECHNICALLY I lost most of my sprites. But I still have what I posted here to backup from, along with something I gave LLa/LL sometime ago (thank you!).

So perhaps *something* will appear *someday* around some *holiday*. I can't promise anything, but keep your eyes open.------------------------------

title: Re: The Fall of the Shadow
content:
N00bS.

- Xterra1 at KeenWiki.
- Megakeen here.
- Whatever awaits in the future.

I almost got Xterra1 banned. I don't have the guts to ban people when I have the power, it seems. I should retire.

I wonder if these two guys are related, because in that case... Oh, what we can expect from someone who likes Doom II, the game that KILLED Keen!

Although... *ugh* it isn't so bad... doom... ummmmmmm [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-redeyes.gif[/img]

Ah, I forgot rkgs legranfromaghommage. That guy around here, last December. I'll sue him for harming my eyes.------------------------------

title: Re: The Fall of the Shadow
content:
That's only three guys you mentioned there, over the span of months and two different sites. Legrandfromage might be nooby, but at least he's trying to be nice.

Like I said (wait, did I?), you're overreacting. The web is full of newbies, n00bs, short-tempered people and spammers. Two isn't a disaster, we can teach them to be good or fend them off if they aren't.____________
Don't see me as an ordinary man.
Even though I am an ordinary man.

Ah, [url=http://DaVince.sitesled.com/]site.[/url]
Oh, and [url=http://www.tengusoft.net/]Team[/url].

title: Re: The Fall of the Shadow
content:
You don't know noob till you saw Harvy. I didn't even know that name could be spelled like that.

Later Mr. Master! Have fun. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img] -----------------------
The end of this post. You may stop reading now.

title: Re: The Fall of the Shadow
content:
Somehow, DaVince's posts are increasing in newbietivity.------------------------------
[url=http://shadowm2006.sitesled.com/]My website[/url]
[url=http://p072.ezboard.com/fpubliccommanderkeenforumfrm20.showMessage?topicID=12.topic]Get Windows/Linux native LModKeen 2 with integrated FIN2BMP![/url]. You know you want to.
[url=http://shadowm2006.sitesled.com/meta/projectpage.htm]The META engine for 2D games[/url].

No need to be elitist; there's a difference between stating the obvious and being a newbie. It's more irritating to see a number of posts pointing fingers and complaining about the wasted space. Hello pot; hello kettle.

The best way to change what you perceive as a lack in quality posting is to set the example yourself. Don't stoop to "that" level, pointing out the shortcomings of others.. instead, do what you can to ensure that your posts are top-notch, and worth reading.

title: Re: ...
content: I made a quick and simple little modification of Doom where the enemies all do completely different things.  Among other things, the Keens chase you and shoot fireballs, and when you do kill them, they fire a stream of rockets.  Commander Keen never goes down easy. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-redeyes.gif[/img] [img]http://i91.photobucket.com/albums/k284/KeegTech/WarholDopefishPNG2.png[/img]
